title: Need a new Mid Champ
body:
I love champs like Azir and Cassio but I need a new mid to play, I was considering Taliyah. I like being able to do damage while zone controlling.
Thoughts?

replies.body:
Have you played Lux and Ziggs?
These are good midlaners.
Aurelion Sol is also considerable.

{{champion:34}} Has some the the highest burst in the game but she can be difficult to play to get the best balance of burst and zone control but once you have mastered her she has some of the highest zoning potential AND burst for people to stupid to be scared of her zones (i may be a bit biased as im an anivia one trick)
Taliyah is so much fun. Would recommend her to anyone who plays mid lane mages.
{{champion:30}}  if you like doing tons of damage {{champion:115}} If you like explosions {{champion:143}} Underrated mid laner, good zoner and deals good damage
Taliyah is good if you like the idea of learning to do roaming ult ganks too. Other recommendations would be Viktor, Velkoz, and Xerath as they're all long-range control.
